visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Average weight and BMI in some countries, women', Axes and labels styling: Define colors, font sizes, or styles for labels, axes, and titles, Data series: Provide the data for each series, including the name of each series and its data, formatted appropriately for Highcharts, Custom colors: Specific list of colors, if desired, Additional configurations: Other settings, such as chart margins, background, legend, etc.

title.text: Average weight and BMI in some countries, women

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with specific details. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title is 'Average weight and BMI in some countries, women'. The x-axis categories represent different countries, while the y-axis is divided into two sections: one for 'Weight' and another for 'BMI'. The 'Weight' series is associated with the primary y-axis, and the 'BMI' series is associated with the secondary y-axis. The chart includes custom styling for the axes and series colors, as defined in the CSS. The plotOptions for the column series include a border radius of 5 to give the columns rounded edges. The tooltip for the 'Weight' series displays the value with 'kg' as a suffix, enhancing user readability.
